Feb. 16, 1935 D Belle Vue February Contest
Belle Vue February Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
belle-vue-february-contest
None
Gems of Schumann
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Hymn tune contest (Sunset - Abide with me). 1st Bethel, 2nd British Oil and Cake Mills. March contest (own choice) - 1st Bethel, 2nd British Oil and Cake Mills, 3rd Victoria Hall. Prizes - 1st £5 and trophy, 2nd £2, 3rd £1, 4th 10s. 3rd annual contest. 17 bands competed.
Jan. 22, 2014, 5:01 p.m. March 28, 2020, 10:10 a.m.
